sense.def:
Zamisli ali mnenja, ki so
contrary
, si nasprotujejo in ne morejo veljati za isto osebo.

seg.quote: They happily tolerated the existence of opinions contrary to their own.

sense.def:
Če rečemo, da je nekaj res
contrary to what someone else believes or says
, hočemo povedati, da je res in se drugi v svojih prepričanjih ali trditvah motijo.

seg.quote: Contrary to what is generally assumed, the adjustment is easily made.

sense.def:
On the contrary
rečemo, kadar nasprotujemo pravkar povedanemu.

seg.quote: ‘You'll get tired of it.’—‘On the contrary. I shall enjoy it.’

sense.def:
Dokazi ali trditve
to the contrary
nasprotujejo tistemu, kar govorimo mi ali kar je rekel nekdo drug.

seg.quote: This method, despite statements to the contrary, has no damaging effects.
